about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The Soul of Old Tbilisi
about.seo_title: About Us — The Story of Muse
about.seo_description: Discover Muse Bar on Vertskhli Street, Tbilisi. Antique decor, grand piano, live music, and a vintage atmosphere in the heart of the old city.
about.story_text: Muse was born from a love for Tbilisi's timeless spirit. Nestled on Vertskhli Street, in the heart of the old city, we created a space where art, music, and hospitality intertwine.
about.atmosphere_text: Step inside and discover antique decor, a grand piano filling the air with melody, and the warm glow of vintage lighting. Every detail has been chosen to transport you to another era.
about.music_text: Every evening, talented musicians bring Muse to life — from intimate piano solos to jazz ensembles and violin performances that echo through the halls.
